english: Fee Standards for Senior High School Textbook Approval
title: 高級中學教科用書審定費收費標準

articles.content: These Standards are adopted pursuant to Article 10, paragraph 1, of the Charges and Fees Act.

A person applying for approval of a senior high school textbook, or applying to revise a textbook during the effective period of a textbook approval license, shall pay in one lump sum an approval fee of the amount specified below to the assessing agency or an account designated by it: 
1. Application for approval: NT$25,000 per set. 
2. Application for revision: NT$13,000 per set.
These Standards shall enter into force from the date of issuance.
